data.title: Under a Dark Sky
data.desc: Yet may it be known that no man who comes to the Dark Forest shall escape unscathed, save for the enlightened and the bold who seek out to defeat the monsters.
about: Transfer exactly 1 CTX on Automata’s ContextFree to earn 12 EXP.
steps: Get CTX tokens from the Automata Faucet by choosing the ContextFree network.
Visit the Automata dashboard and make sure you’re on the ContextFree Network to transfer exactly 1 CTX to this address.
Receive 12 EXP once the transfer has been confirmed!

data.title: The Eternal Battle
data.desc: The horde of Specters that roam the forest in its darkest hour are an omen of disaster. The appearance of these ancient creatures foreshadows war and woe.
about: The amount of EXP that can be earned depends on your character’s MP and the amount of CTX transferred from ContextFree to Ropsten Testnet. 1 MP is used up for 1 CTX attack, with 1 CTX = 100 damage. Players will not be able to attack if they have no MP left.
For example, a player with 10 MP who chooses to transfer 20 CTX will only be able to attack 10 times, causing a total damage of 10 x 100 = 1000.

Damage to the Specters are calculated by the total amount of damage caused by all players in-game, with Specters’ remaining HP updated in real-time. Specters are defeated once HP=0. Players will not receive EXP if the Specters are not killed by the end of the quest.
steps: Get CTX tokens from the Automata Faucet by choosing the ContextFree network.
Set up your ContextFree Network Wallet with your game address.
Visit chain bridge, select 'Native to ERC20', and transfer the desired amount of CTX to this address. Learn more about using the Automata Token Bridge with our user guide.
Each CTX causes 100 damage, and you will receive EXP rewards equal to the total amount of damage once the Specters have been defeated.

data.title: Revealing the Unseen
data.desc: At the heart of the Forest lies the Leshen. What makes these highly intelligent creatures truly dangerous is their mastery of deception, beguilement and disorientation.
about: Submit a proposal and vote for it to pass by organizing your own team consisting of at least three members. To create a proposal, you’ll need to have at least 30 CTX in your account. Pool resources to better your chances.

It will take a few minutes for the proposal to be listed once it has been submitted successfully. Get together with team members to cast votes within 3 hours before time’s up. Once your proposal passes, it will take approximately 15 minutes for it to be enacted and for EXP rewards to be distributed.

Each team member receives EXP points only for their first successful attempt. To illustrate, Player 1’s address is submitted under 2 different teams’ proposals, Team A and Team B. Given that Team A’s proposal is approved first under the governance mechanism, Player 1 receives EXP points from Team A and is not eligible for any subsequent rewards from Team B’s proposal, if it is passed.
Total EXP will be shared equally among the final number of team members.
steps: Visit the Automata dashboard and make sure you’re on the ContextFree Network.
Select 'Democracy' under the Governance tab, and click on 'Submit preimage'.
Select “game” under Propose. Account addresses of all members in the team must be added as “participants”, including your own.
Jot down your preimage hash and submit preimage.
Enter the preimage hash after selecting 'Submit Proposal'.

data.title: After the Ashes
data.desc: The bearer of the light may enter and leave the Dark Forest at will, and shall for no reason be perturbed, harmed or harassed in any way or manner.

data.title: Hope Burns Bright
data.desc: Only those whose will is strong can find the path. Shine a light into the corners of the Forest which grows with every new area being discovered.
about: Transfer exactly 1 CTX from Ropsten Testnet to ContextFree to earn 3 MP.
steps: Get CTX tokens from the Automata Faucet by choosing the Ropsten Testnet.
Set up your Metamask Wallet with your game address.
Visit chain bridge, select 'ERC20 to Native', and transfer exactly 1 CTX to your Substrate address. Learn more about using the Automata Token Bridge with our user guide.
Receive 3 MP once the transfer has been confirmed!
